features: Aesthetic Pens: 10 pack aesthetic pens with beautiful gradient colors and creative design are super soft and comfortable in the hand. Great for home school office supplies.
0.7mm Black Ink: The Linfanc gel pens write super smoothly and consistently with medium point 0.7mm vivid black ink. The rich ultra-black ink makes your handwriting beautiful and clear.
Practical Pocket Clip: The pocket clip with little steel ball design can be easily attached to notebooks pockets and binders. Also, the rolling the ball on the clip like a fidget for entertaining.
Retractable Design: Easy to use, click to open/close. The satisfying click response makes it a great way to relieve stress and spark inspiration.

Best Gift Pens: The aesthetic gel pens with gradient color barrel are so pretty and cute. Ideal gifts for students, co-workers, teachers, friends, and family. Prefect for birthday, Christmas, back to school gifts and office gifts.
body.description: Product Specifications: Package Includes: 10 pcs gel pens Line Point: Medium point 0.7mm Ink Color: All black ink Pen Barrel Color: Gradient color Length: 5 3/4" ( 147mm ) Diameter: 3/8" ( 10mm ) Weigh: 9/16 oz ( 16g ) The Length of Pen Refill: 4 3/8" ( 110mm ) Note: Please completely remove the red wax ball on the pen tip before first writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found myself in need of new pens for the new work backpack I got and I wanted them to match. I'm autistic and tactile sensitive, so I was happy to discover that these pens were velvety smooth. The ink doesn't seem to smear and the flow is nearly perfect. My only critique about the pen is that the little ball bearing in the clip actually can come out if you're prone to fidgeting with it. But it snaps back in no problem. I foresee myself owning this set with no ball bearings in the future. 10/10 Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Im addicted to buying pens and I saw these and decided to give it a try and it did not dissapoint. They write so smooth and do not bleed through. The pen has a nice smooth touch and the color is so unique. My co workers loved them and I will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m a salesman for cars, so pens are pretty important to my job. I’ve bought pens at all different price points and these pens beat them all. I love the soft feel of the pen in your hand, the roller ball on the pen clip keeps it from breaking off on your shirt, and the ink writes smooth without smudges. Can’t recommend enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Gradient Pastel Colored - Black Ink - Gel Pens!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a few pens for work (and journaling in my free time). I work in a laboratory and there are a few specifications I must follow for pens - black ink and no pen caps! These fit the bill... Also they are super cute pastel colors, they click nice and have a soft ergonomic grip. They write smooth but they sometimes "skip" when writing, thus the 4 star instead of 5 star rating but it's not enough of an issue/ doesn't happen frequently enough that would make me not want to order them again. Overall, nice pen for a good price! 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write Amazon reviews, but I had to let ya'll know - these are some of my absolute favorite pens of all time. Very comfortable material, a unique tip, smooth writing, beautiful colors, and thoughtful packaging. Very glad I bought these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Left handed approved
reviews.reviewText: Im left handed and these pens write so smooth and have a good quality to them. I will say they do smear a LITTLE but it dries fast. Very good quality pens overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality aesthetic pens!
reviews.reviewText: I'd definitely recommend these for anyone who's really particular about their pens! The aesthetic is very clean and it writes wonderfully. The weight of the pen is such a subtle component that I think is really what sets it apart from a lot of the pens I've used. Packaging is really wonderful too.Only taking one star as if you're used to a grip or some other design, there will be a degree of discomfort which I imagine will go away with time. I have a callus building up along the inside of my finger that is making it a bit uncomfortable to write with for extended periods of time. Not a deal breaker by any means but important to note if those sort of things affect you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They write so smoothly and are so soft to hold! Buy them!!
